   if (window.location.hash &amp;&amp; window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "&#39;BERG BUCKS FAQs";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>

 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.
   </div>

    <script>
     $(document).ready(function () {
            $('#iview').show();
            $('#iview').iView({
                pauseTime: 6000,
                directionNav: false,
                fx: "fade",
                    tooltipY: -15,
                    timer: "Bar",
                    pauseOnHover: "false",
                    controlNav: "true"
                });
            });
    </script>

    <div id="iview" style="width:940px; height:247px;">
     <!--SDC Component tcm:1703-54029-->
     <a data-iview:image="/Images/Berg_Banner_4_tcm1703-96015.jpg" data-iview:thumbnail="" data-iview:type="">

     </a>

   <div id="subs-container">
    <div class="top-corners">
     <div class="tr-corner">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="column-66 float-left">
      <div class="pane-accord" id="tcm51666">
       <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
                $("#accordion_51666").accordion({
                    heightStyle: "content"
                });
            });
       </script>
       <style type="text/css">
        #accordion_51666 h3 {
	        font:bold 12px Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif !important;
        }
        #accordion_51666 div.accordionBody {
	        border-top:1px dashed #ccc;
	        background:#f4f5f6;
                        overflow: hidden;
        }
        #accordion_51666 div.ui-corner-bottom {
            border-bottom-left-radius:0;
            border-bottom-right-radius:0;
        }
       </style>
       <div id="hideinse" style="display:block">
        <h2 class="locs">
         'BERG BUCKS: Frequently Asked Questions
        </h2>
        <div id="accordion_51666">
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           What is ‘BERG BUCKS?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           ‘BERG BUCKS is the name of the declining balance account previously known as Flex Dollars.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           How do I open a “BERG BUCKS” account?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           Mail a check payable to “MC ‘BERG BUCKS” to the
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/aboutus/controller/" target="_blank">
            Controller’s Office
           </a>
           .
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Is ‘BERG BUCKS part of meal plans?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           ‘BERG BUCKS is not part of meal plans, but offers an opportunity to customize plans offering additional buying power to meet your needs.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           What is the difference between ‘BERG BUCKS and Dining Dollars?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           <strong>
            ‘BERG BUCKS: 
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Are not part of any meal plans. 
           </li>
           <li>
            May be used at on campus dining venues, the ‘Berg Bookshop, on campus laundry machines in major residence halls. 
           </li>
           <li>
            Unspent funds roll from semester to semester and year to year. Unspent funds ($25.00 or greater) will be refunded to the student. 
           </li>
           <li>
            Funds can be added at any time. 
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Dining Dollars: 
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Are exclusive to Platinum, Gold, Silver, Bronze and Cardinal meal plans. 
           </li>
           <li>
            May only be used at on campus dining venues. 
           </li>
           <li>
            Unspent funds roll from semester to semester but are forfeited at the conclusion of the Spring semester.
           </li>
           <li>
            Additional funds may not be added.
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           What is a declining balance?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           Declining balance means with every transaction the amount available in the account declines; similar to a pre-paid gift card.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           What happens if I don’t have sufficient funds in my account?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           Transactions will be denied if sufficient funds are unavailable to cover a purchase.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Can I pay with a combination of ‘BERG BUCKS and another form of payment (Cash, Credit, Debit or Check)?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           You may tell the vendor to apply $X.XX using your ‘BERG BUCKS and pay the balance with another form of payment.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Can I withdraw cash or receive cash back with a ‘BERG BUCKS account?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           Cash withdrawals or cash back above the amount of sale are NOT an option.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           How can I check my ‘BERG BUCKS balance?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           When making a purchase, ask a cashier for your current balance.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           How can I add funds to my ‘BERG BUCKS account?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           To add funds, cardholders can visit the Cashier Window through the
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/aboutus/controller/" target="_blank">
            Controller’s Office
           </a>
           located in the lower level of the Haas College Center or mail a check to the Controller’s Office made payable to “MC ‘BERG BUCKS”.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           What happens to unspent ‘BERG BUCKS funds?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           The ‘BERG BUCKS fund balance transfers from year to year and ends at graduation. Students are encouraged to keep minimal balances in their ‘BERG BUCKS account. After graduation, accounts with remaining ‘BERG BUCKS funds in excess of $25.00, will be refunded to the student. Accounts with $25.00 and less will be transferred to the Class Year Fund.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Is there a minimum deposit?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           The minimum deposit is $25.00. You may start with a minimum deposit in the ‘BERG BUCKS account and review the activity to estimate usage. Additional deposits may be made throughout the year.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Are there other policies regarding ‘BERG BUCKS that I should be aware of?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           Please
           <a target="_blank" title="Bergs-Bucks-Policies" href="/Images/Bergs-Bucks-Policies_tcm1703-51623.pdf">
            click here
           </a>
           to view the complete ‘BERG BUCKS Policy.
          </p>
         </div>
         <h3>
          <a href="#">
           Who can I contact if I have additional questions?
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="accordionBody">
          <span>
          </span>
          <p>
           For questions related to on-campus dining contact Muhlenberg Dining at:
           <a href="mailto:diningcomments@muhlenberg.edu">
            diningcomments@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           or (484) 664-4047 
          </p>
          <p>
           For questions concerning ‘Berg Bucks accounts (opening an account, balance information, adding funds, etc.) contact the Controller’s Office at:
           <a href="mailto:arlevito@muhlenberg.edu">
            arlevito@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="mailto:dromig@muhlenberg.edu">
            dromig@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           or (484) 664-3150.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="column-33 float-right">
      <div id="loggedin">
       <span id="span_loggedin">
       </span>
      </div>
      <div class="sub-news-top">
       <div class="sub-news-rt">
       </div>
      </div>
